name: Animated Chained Library
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

traits.False Object: If the library is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the library move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15+1d4 + 13 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the library is animate.

actions.Chained Book: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12+1d4 + 10).
